name: Boohoomian Rhapsody
description:
#Boohoomian Rhapsody is a multiplayer party game.

The kid, Sid, has to find his lost dog Choco in a musical haunted mansion. 

The ghost can return to life if he possess a dead body, so it will try to harm the kid. In this dynamic both players challenge each other to be the one who founds Choco and leave the mansion alive.

Ghost player Keys:

w/a/s/d -for movement

q -for interacting with objects

space  -to leave an object

Kid player:

arrokeys -for movement

right shift -to jump

Enter/Return -when in ghost state to interact with objects

Credits:
